scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false BROWSER=none CI=false DISABLE_WORKBOX=true SKIP_WORKBOX=true npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
